title: Gokul Restaurant
description: A small Hindu outdoor patio restaurant connected to the theater. Short menu with authentic Indian cuisine. Menu items are mix and match, and the plate of the day is filling. Previously named Cafe Giratablas. Reported to have moved to the University of Costa Rica area. Note: Located in San Pedro, Calle de la Amargura, across the train rails, in front of bar-rest Omar Khayyan. Next to COASA photocopies. If coming from Los Yoses (ruta de San Pedro), near the corner of 27th street (diagonal from KFC).
streetAddress: San Pedro, Calle de la Amargura
